onyomiExamples.meaning: ancient and modern times, all ages, past and present
home town, birthplace, native place, one's old home, ruins, historic remains
reminiscence, nostalgia, thinking fondly of the past, recalling the old days

kunyomiExamples.meaning: old, aged, ancient, antiquated, antique, timeworn, long, since long ago, time-honored, of the distant past, long-ago, stale, threadbare, hackneyed, corny, old-fashioned, outmoded, out-of-date
